properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 2 at 2:30AM PST until January 3 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south wind increasing to 20 to 30
kt with gusts up to 40 kt tonight and continuing through early
Friday afternoon. For the Small Craft Advisory, south to
southwest wind increasing to 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
this afternoon. Seas 13 to 16 ft at 17 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10
NM and Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60
NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 1 PM
PST Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 PM PST this
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM PST FRIDAY
